code: import'./style/LandingPage.scss';import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import ProfilePic from'../../../assets/LandingPage/pfp.jpg';import HighlightButton from'../../Components/Buttons/HighlightButton';import React from'react';import LanguageSelectButton from'../../Components/Buttons/LanguageSelectButton';import{getAge}from'../../../util/AgeUtil';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LandingPage=/*#__PURE__*/React.forwardRef((props,ref)=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const jumpToSection=section=>{window.location.href="#".concat(section);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:ref,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-landing",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"name-picture-display",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-picture-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"profile-picture",src:ProfilePic})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"name-display",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"big-text",children:"Skifty"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"small-text",children:t("LandingPageHeader").replace("{year}","".concat(getAge()))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"smaller-text",children:t("LandingPageWelcome")})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HighlightButton,{onClick:()=>{if(props.isMobile)jumpToSection('aboutme-header');else props.changePage(1);},label:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HighlightButton,{onClick:()=>{if(props.isMobile)jumpToSection('projects-header');else props.changePage(3);},label:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HighlightButton,{onClick:()=>{if(props.isMobile)jumpToSection('contact-header');else props.changePage(5);},label:"Contact"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"button-row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LanguageSelectButton,{})})]})});});export default LandingPage;
